name: Bloodfeather

skills.name: Hunt Down
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has an extra 10% chance of inflicting a critical hit.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%

skills.name: Armor Breaker
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has an extra 15% chance of inflicting a critical hit. Places a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff for 2 turns.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +10%
Lvl. 4 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Charged Shot
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Places a 30% [Decrease SPD] debuff for 2 turns. Decreases the target's Turn Meter by 30%.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +10%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1
